00001 package newtonERP.serveur;
00002 
00003 import java.io.File;
00004 import java.util.Hashtable;
00005 
00006 import javax.xml.parsers.DocumentBuilder;
00007 import javax.xml.parsers.DocumentBuilderFactory;
00008 
00009 import org.w3c.dom.Document;
00010 import org.w3c.dom.NamedNodeMap;
00011 import org.w3c.dom.Node;
00012 import org.w3c.dom.NodeList;
00013 
00019 public class ConfigManager
00020 {
00021         private static File file = null;
00022         private static Document document = null;
00023         private static final String configFile = "config.xml";
00024 
00025         private static Hashtable<String, String> propertyValue = new Hashtable<String, String>();
00026 
00027         private static Document getDocument() throws Exception
00028         {
00029                 if (document == null)
00030                 {
00031                         DocumentBuilderFactory dbf = DocumentBuilderFactory.newInstance();
00032                         DocumentBuilder db = dbf.newDocumentBuilder();
00033                         document = db.parse(getFile());
00034                         document.getDocumentElement().normalize();
00035                 }
00036                 return document;
00037         }
00038 
00039         private static File getFile()
00040         {
00041                 if (file == null)
00042                         file = new File(configFile);
00043                 return file;
00044         }
00045 
00053         public static String loadStringProperty(String propertyName,
00054                         String attributName, String defaultValue)
00055         {
00056                 if (propertyName.contains("#")
00057                                 || (attributName != null && attributName.contains("#")))
00058                         throw new RuntimeException(
00059                                         "name of config property or config attribut cannot containe '#' char");
00060                 if (propertyValue.containsKey(propertyName + "#" + attributName))
00061                         return propertyValue.get(propertyName + "#" + attributName);
00062 
00063                 try
00064                 {
00065                         String val;
00066                         NodeList nodeList = getDocument()
00067                                         .getElementsByTagName(propertyName);
00068                         Node node = nodeList.item(0);
00069                         if (attributName != null)
00070                         {
00071                                 NamedNodeMap attributeList = node.getAttributes();
00072                                 val = attributeList.getNamedItem(attributName).getFirstChild()
00073                                                 .getNodeValue();
00074                         }
00075                         else
00076                         {
00077                                 val = node.getFirstChild().getNodeValue();
00078                         }
00079 
00080                         propertyValue.put(propertyName + "#" + attributName, val);
00081                         return val;
00082                 } catch (Exception e)
00083                 {
00084                         if (defaultValue == null)
00085                                 throw new RuntimeException(
00086                                                 "the property "
00087                                                                 + propertyName
00088                                                                 + " is needed in the config file, there is no default value possible");
00089 
00090                         propertyValue.put(propertyName + "#" + attributName, defaultValue);
00091                         return defaultValue;
00092                 }
00093         }
00094 
00101         public static String loadStringProperty(String propertyName,
00102                         String defaultValue)
00103         {
00104                 return loadStringProperty(propertyName, null, defaultValue);
00105         }
00106 
00112         public static String loadStringAttrProperty(String propertyName,
00113                         String attributName)
00114         {
00115                 return loadStringProperty(propertyName, attributName, null);
00116         }
00117 
00122         public static String loadStringProperty(String propertyName)
00123         {
00124                 return loadStringProperty(propertyName, null);
00125         }
00126 
00134         public static int loadIntProperty(String propertyName, String attributName,
00135                         Integer defaultValue)
00136         {
00137                 return Integer.parseInt(loadStringProperty(propertyName, attributName,
00138                                 defaultValue + ""));
00139         }
00140 
00147         public static int loadIntProperty(String propertyName, Integer defaultValue)
00148 
00149         {
00150                 return loadIntProperty(propertyName, null, defaultValue);
00151         }
00152 
00158         public static int loadIntAttrProperty(String propertyName,
00159                         String attributName)
00160         {
00161                 return loadIntProperty(propertyName, attributName, null);
00162         }
00163 
00168         public static int loadIntProperty(String propertyName)
00169         {
00170                 return loadIntProperty(propertyName, null);
00171         }
00172 
00180         public static boolean loadBoolProperty(String propertyName,
00181                         String attributName, Boolean defaultValue)
00182         {
00183                 return Boolean.parseBoolean(loadStringProperty(propertyName,
00184                                 attributName, defaultValue + ""));
00185         }
00186 
00193         public static boolean loadBoolProperty(String propertyName,
00194                         Boolean defaultValue)
00195         {
00196                 return loadBoolProperty(propertyName, null, defaultValue);
00197         }
00198 
00204         public static boolean loadBoolAttrProperty(String propertyName,
00205                         String attributName)
00206         {
00207                 return loadBoolProperty(propertyName, attributName, null);
00208         }
00209 
00214         public static boolean loadBoolProperty(String propertyName)
00215 
00216         {
00217                 return loadBoolProperty(propertyName, null);
00218         }
00219 }
